SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE FOUNDATION PUBLISHES PRAYER BOOKS IN PRINT AND PROVIDES PRAYER BOOKS VIA ITS INTERNET SITE; PROVIDES BOOKS, TAPES, VIDEOS, AND OTHER RESOURCES TO NEEDY CHRISTIANS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES FUNDS TO CHRISTIAN MINISTRIES AROUND THE WORLD FOR EVANGELISM, ORPHANAGES, HOMELESS SHELTERS, ETC. THIS INCLUDES A PROGRAM TO SEND NEEDY CHILDREN TO CHURCH CAMPS, AND PROVIDE FOOD TO LOCAL FOOD BANKS.

OtherAssetsScheduleGrp.Desc: REMAINDER INTEREST IN WINCHESTER ROAD FARM
